title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6650.4 - Hours for public inspection
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 6650.4 - Hours for public inspection

State Regulations

Requests for public access to records shall be accepted and
records produced during all hours regularly open for business. These hours are
from: 9:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m., Monday-Friday. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
6650.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
